sources.title: Peck's Bad Boy
sources.description: ACE Pictures presents Jackie Cooper in Peck's Bad Boy based on the famous story of the same title by George W. Peck. Shot in Black and White; directed by Edward F. Cline and recorded by RCA Victor System.

sources.title: Peck's Bad Boy
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Peck's Bad Boy (1934) JACKIE COOPER
sources.description:
Stars: Jackie Cooper, Thomas Meighan, Jackie Searl 
Director: Edward F. Cline

Young Bill Peck adores his father and tries to be good, but the arrival of his bratty cousin results in him getting in trouble.

metadata.Plot: Young boy Bill Peck adores his father and tries to be good, but the arrival of Bill's cousin Horace upsets Bill's plans. Horace's brattish ways result in Bill rather than Horace getting in trouble.
metadata.Writer: George W. Peck, Bernard Schubert, Marguerite Roberts
metadata.Actors: Jackie Cooper, Thomas Meighan, Jackie Searl
